title: White Chocolate Pretzel Crisps Sparklers
directions: Microwave white chocolate chips in a microwave safe bowl until beginning to melt. Stir. Microwave another few seconds until completely melted.
Dip different parts of Original Pretzel Crisps into the chocolate. Coat with gold sprinkles or white sugar pearls and set aside to cool and harden. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 (7.2 ounce) package Original Snack Factory Pretzel Crisps
